metadata.title: USN-3299-1 -- Firefox update
metadata.description: Some security information preloaded in Firefox was due to expire before the next scheduled release. This update bumps the expiration times.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3299-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  firefox-locale-nl - 53.0.3+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.2 firefox-locale-nn - 53.0.3+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.2 firefox-locale-nb -
